MADA.title: MA DA
MADA.description: MA DA is a haunting horror film that delves into the terrifying world of the unknown. As dark secrets unfold, the protagonists find themselves in a life-threatening situation that challenges their sanity.

SHIN_2024.title: SHIN CHAN
SHIN_2024.description: Join Shin and his friends on a hilarious and heartwarming adventure in 'Our Dinosaur Diary'. The film combines humor and adventure, making it a perfect family film that appeals to all ages.

BORDERLANDS.title: BORDERLANDS
BORDERLANDS.description: Return to Pandora in this epic sci-fi adventure where the stakes are higher than ever. The film blends humor with intense action scenes, taking the audience on a thrilling journey across the galaxy.

REVOLVER.title: REVOLVER
REVOLVER.description: Revolver tells the story of a womanâ€™s journey for revenge and justice. With intense action sequences and a gripping storyline, this thriller keeps you on the edge of your seat.

WRONG_SIDE.title: WRONG SIDE
WRONG_SIDE.description: Wrong Side is an intense action thriller that explores the dark side of human nature. The film follows the protagonist as they fight against all odds in a high-stakes battle for survival.

AMDUONGSU.title: THE MASTER
AMDUONGSU.description: The Yin-Yang Master is a visually stunning fantasy film that takes you into a mystical world where magic and reality intertwine. Follow the master as he battles dark forces threatening the balance of the world.

HAROLD.title: HAROLD
HAROLD.description: Harold is a heartwarming comedy-drama that chronicles the life of a man trying to rediscover himself. The film combines humor with poignant moments, creating a touching narrative about life and self-acceptance.

ROMULUS.title: ROMULUS
ROMULUS.description: Romulus is a historical action film that transports you to the time of ancient Rome. The film depicts the brutal and intense battles fought by the warriors of Rome, highlighting their valor and determination.

HAI_MUOI.title: TWENTY
HAI_MUOI.description: Twenty is a coming-of-age drama that captures the exuberance and challenges of youth. The film portrays the journey of three young friends as they navigate through the ups and downs of their twenties.

PILOT.title: PILOT
PILOT.description: Pilot is an action-packed adventure film that follows the life of a young aviator with big dreams. The film showcases the thrills and dangers of flying, and the personal sacrifices required to achieve greatness.

HELLBOY.title: HELLBOY
HELLBOY.description: Hellboy returns in this explosive action film where he battles the forces of darkness to save humanity. With stunning visual effects and intense fight scenes, this film is a must-watch for action enthusiasts.

WOLF.title: WOLF
WOLF.description: Wolf is a horror-action film that dives into the myth of the werewolf. The movie combines horror with high-octane action as the protagonist fights against their primal instincts to protect those they love.
